query.statement: INSERT INTO SYS_BIZ_TRIP ( TRIP_CD, REG_DATE, FLAG, DEPT_ID, USER_ID, TITLE, OBJECTIVE, FROM_DATE, TO_DATE, AMOUNT ) VALUES ( :vo.tripCd, TO_DATE(:vo.regDate, 'yyyy-mm-dd hh24:mi:ss'), :vo.flag, :vo.deptId, :vo.userId, :vo.title, :vo.objective, TO_DATE(:vo.fromDate, 'yyyy-mm-dd hh24:mi:ss'), TO_DATE(:vo.toDate, 'yyyy-mm-dd hh24:mi:ss'), :vo.amount )
UPDATE SYS_BIZ_TRIP SET FLAG = :vo.flag WHERE TRIP_CD = :vo.tripCd

SELECT TRIP_CD, TO_CHAR(REG_DATE, 'yyyy-mm-dd hh24:mi:ss') REG_DATE, FLAG, DEPT_ID, USER_ID, TITLE, OBJECTIVE, TO_CHAR(FROM_DATE, 'yyyy-mm-dd') FROM_DATE, TO_CHAR(TO_DATE, 'yyyy-mm-dd') TO_DATE, AMOUNT FROM SYS_BIZ_TRIP ORDER BY REG_DATE desc

SELECT TRIP_CD, TO_CHAR(REG_DATE, 'yyyy-mm-dd hh24:mi:ss') REG_DATE, FLAG, DEPT_ID, USER_ID, TITLE, OBJECTIVE, TO_CHAR(FROM_DATE, 'yyyy-mm-dd') FROM_DATE, TO_CHAR(TO_DATE, 'yyyy-mm-dd') TO_DATE, AMOUNT FROM SYS_BIZ_TRIP WHERE TRIP_CD = :vo.tripCd
